what: Data on Asylum and Resettlement for the UK
title: Data on Asylum and Resettlement for the UK
text: asylum package provides easy access asylum resettlement datasets UK, published Home Office. current release uses recent data December 2022.

title: Data on Asylum and Resettlement for the UK
text: Install released version asylum CRAN: Alternatively, can install development version GitHub :

title: Data on Asylum and Resettlement for the UK
text: calculate number applications Afghanistan awaiting decision, latest quarter:
code: library(asylum) library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union  asylum::awaiting_decision |>    filter(Nationality == "Afghanistan" & Date == max(Date)) |>    summarise(`Total applications awaiting a decision` = sum(Applications)) #> # A tibble: 1 × 1 #>   `Total applications awaiting a decision` #>                                      <dbl> #> 1                                    13179

title: Data on Asylum and Resettlement for the UK
text: encounter clear bug, please file issue minimal reproducible example GitHub. Please note project released Contributor Code Conduct. participating project agree abide terms.

Breakdown of Asylum costs and productivity — asylum_costs_and_productivity
text: data frame 12 rows 12 variables: Financial Year Financial year Total Asylum Costs costs managing asylum operations claim include ) costs associated deciding case (screening clients, interviews issuing decision), b) managing related appeal, c) cost asylum operations support (S4, S95 & S98) d) detention costs detention used e) enforcement costs (escorting assisted voluntary returns). Also included costs department staff buildings proportionate costs Home Office building managerial costs Asylum WIP (new method) Number work progress claims (new method) Asylum WIP (old method) Number work progress claims (old method) Unit Cost Unit Costs - based Work Progress figure. costs asylum operations case vary considerably dependent type case (single, dependents) well barriers documentation, legal challenges logistical practical challenges Total Conclusion Total conclusions Average Conclusions Per Month Average conclusions per month Conclusions Productivity Conclusions producitivity Total Principal Stages Completed Total principal stages completed Average Principal Stages Completed Per Month Average principal stages completed per month Asylum Caseworking Staff Number asylum caseworking staff Productivity Productivity staff
